185693842.review:
Homeworld Remastered Edition is a triumph. It’s not just a remaster; it’s a heartfelt return to a masterpiece, a glorious reimagining of a game that forever changed the landscape of real-time strategy. Homeworld, the iconic 3D space RTS, has been given new life, and with it, the soul of the original remains intact, while embracing the technological advancements of today. The remastered edition honors the spirit of the game while delivering a visual and auditory experience that rivals modern standards.

A Journey Through the Cosmos
For those who never experienced the original Homeworld, the Remastered Edition offers an opportunity to witness the evolution of a genre and the power of a truly immersive narrative. Set in the far reaches of space, Homeworld tells the epic story of the Kushan people, exiled from their homeworld for centuries, now journeying across the stars to reclaim their birthright. It’s a tale of loss, survival, and hope, set against the backdrop of an endlessly expansive universe. The story doesn’t just inform the gameplay; it imbues each mission with emotional depth.

In the Remastered Edition, this narrative is presented as vividly as ever, with gorgeous cinematics and voice acting that carry the weight of the story across the vast emptiness of space. Whether you’re exploring unknown worlds or engaging in fierce space battles, you’ll feel the stakes, the triumphs, and the tragedies as if they were your own.

The Visuals: A Cosmic Rebirth
One of the most striking improvements in the Remastered Edition is its visual overhaul. The original Homeworld set a standard for space strategy games with its 3D environments and breathtaking scope. But now, thanks to modern graphics technology, the remaster transforms these vast, sweeping vistas into stunning, detailed works of art. The ships—each one a marvel of design—now gleam with intricate textures, while the environments surrounding them shine with dazzling starfields, nebulae, and planets that feel alive with the cosmic majesty of space. The scale of the battles, once awe-inspiring, now feels even more grandiose, as you watch your fleets engage in the deep void of space.

And yet, despite these cutting-edge graphics, the developers have stayed true to the original’s visual style. You can still switch between the remastered graphics and the classic look, allowing you to compare the past and present, and witness the evolution of a game that was already ahead of its time.

The Soundtrack: A Symphony of Stars
No review of Homeworld would be complete without mentioning the soundtrack. The remaster preserves the legendary score composed by Paul Ruskay, whose haunting, ethereal music will forever be linked with the emotional core of the game. From the melancholic melodies that evoke the loneliness of space to the rousing themes of triumph, the music of Homeworld is as beautiful and evocative as ever. The remaster allows for a richer, more immersive listening experience, with higher-quality sound and a deeper sense of presence. It’s a soundtrack that elevates every moment in the game, whether you’re embarking on a campaign or simply navigating the vast emptiness of space.

Gameplay: A Timeless Classic
At its heart, Homeworld Remastered Edition stays true to the gameplay that made the original a genre-defining classic. The game’s real-time 3D space combat remains as exhilarating as ever. You control your fleet, guiding ships through treacherous missions, engaging in epic space battles, and carefully managing resources. The strategic depth is unparalleled, as you must consider the position, movement, and capabilities of every ship in your fleet to outmaneuver and defeat your enemies.

But there’s more than just combat here. The game encourages exploration and thoughtful strategy, as you navigate space not just as a battlefield, but as a living, breathing universe. Each mission introduces new challenges, forcing you to adapt, evolve, and think creatively. The remaster brings the original experience to modern systems with improved stability and UI refinements, ensuring a smoother, more enjoyable experience for both newcomers and long-time fans.

A New Generation of Fans
For those who are new to Homeworld, the Remastered Edition is the perfect introduction to a legendary series. For veterans, it’s a chance to relive an unforgettable adventure, but with modern visuals and features that enhance what was already a brilliant game. The remaster includes both the original game and Homeworld 2, providing hours of additional content and ensuring that the legacy of Homeworld lives on for a new generation of gamers.

Conclusion: A Stellar Remaster
Homeworld Remastered Edition is everything a remaster should be: respectful of its roots, but willing to evolve and embrace the advancements of today. The remaster does more than just polish the visuals; it breathes new life into a classic, preserving the magic while making it more immersive, beautiful, and accessible. This is a game that still stands as one of the greatest achievements in real-time strategy, and its remastered edition only cements its place in gaming history.

Whether you’re a longtime fan or a newcomer, Homeworld Remastered Edition is an experience that deserves to be witnessed, a love letter to both the past and the future of gaming.

185650669.review: There is a very good reason why Homeworld won Game of the Year.  Besides the smooth graphics and gameplay, and the wonderful sound design and music, it was a fantastically-made RTS flipped upside-down by adding in a third dimension.  The difficulty curve can be steep until you learn just how obscenely powerful Salvage Corvettes are.  Even in the Remastered Edition, where you are limited in how many of them you can build.  The sequel, Catalysm, is missing because it cannot be run on any OS after Vista.  This is tragic, given that it is far closer to the original than Homeworld 2.

185619464.review:
Back in it's earlier days when mods first hit, I loved this game, never actually finished the story though the mods just made it far more fun to just do skirmish.

However I'm not a fan of the 3d movement it's rather frustrating keeping track of everything and everything just seems a little too small, or the scale of the map is a bit too large idk I wish they went with more of a grid system.

Shame it seems modding has gone as far as it's gonna go.

I dont hate or really love the game I did play it a lot when star wars mods released for it and  was hyped.

Good game, just dont get the 3rd game.

185568168.review: I loved the original classic Homeworld.  It hurts my heart to report that it seems to have a rather unfortunate malfunction that pretty much renders the game unplayable. (To be fair, this is my gut feeling.  I have zero proof of this.)

185549109.review: HW1 and 2 belong in the Pantheon of RTS greats. Beautiful and faithful remaster, must have for any space RTS enthusiasts, still one of the few options for epic beautiful space battles.

185528847.review:
[b]Homeworld Remastered Collection[/b] to rewelacyjny zestaw dwóch odświeżonych klasycznych tytułów z gatunku gier strategicznych w której to widowiskowa akcja rozgrywać się będzie w dalekiej przestrzeni kosmicznej gdzie gracz będzie walczył z wrogo nastawionymi do was frakcjami.

Tytuł być może nie jest idealny dla każdego, klasyk dedykowany jest w szczególności dla fanów kosmicznych strategii w którym wybuchowa rozgrywka łączy się z ciekawą fabułą otulona w nieziemski klimat.

[i]Mała dygresja:[/i]

1. Nie zwracajcie uwagi na mój czas gry na platformie Steam, gdyż jest nieadekwatny z rzeczywistym czasem spędzonym z tym tytułem który ogrywałem/ukończyłem już w przeszłości. Posiadam je również na innych platformach z grami cyfrowymi.

2. Homeworld Remastered Collection w którego skład wchodzi Homeworld i Homeworld 2 posiada w sobie oprócz odświeżonych produkcji z ulepszoną grafiką, muzyką oraz przebudowanymi na nowo przerywnikami filmowymi również pierwotne wydania owych gier.

[h1]Ale do rzeczy:[/h1]

Jak już wspomniałem na samym początku tej recenzji mamy tym razem do czynienia z dwoma odświeżonymi klasycznymi tytułami z gatunku gier strategicznych w której to widowiskowa akcja rozgrywać się będzie w dalekiej przestrzeni kosmicznej gdzie gracz będzie walczył z wrogo nastawionymi do was frakcjami. Wszystko to zostało owinięte w rewelacyjny klimat, który aż wbija w fotel motywując tym samym gracza do dalszej zabawy.

A co tyczy się szkieletu samej rozgrywki to w obu przypadkach jest on typowo klasyczny jak na produkcje tego typu. Polegający na zbieraniu surowców z otaczających was obszarów w przestrzeni kosmicznej, rozbudowanie floty, rozwijaniu technologii oraz walce z agresywnym przeciwnikiem – który o dziwo nie jest wcale taki głupi jakby można by sobie to wyobrazić. Należy rozważnie podchodzić do ewentualnego szturmu na jego pozycje, gdyż można w bardzo szybkim tempie stracić całą flotę – a surowców nie ma wcale tak dużo w poszczególnych misjach kampanii aby było można było swobodnie i do woli tworzyć jednostki. Dobrze przygotowane przerywniki filmowe usytuowane pomiędzy kolejnymi misjami, opowiadające burzliwą historie będą budować dalsze tło fabularne. To tyle, bądź aż tyle w temacie samej rozgrywki.

Co do kwestii technicznych, gra działa bezproblemowo na współczesnych komputerach, oprawa audiowizualna odświeżonych produkcji jest rewelacyjna, sterowanie banalnie proste. Samouczek wprowadzający w bardzo czytelny i praktyczny sposób nauczy każdego podstaw rozgrywki aby w późniejszym czasie można by bezproblemowo zarządzać wasza gwiezdną flotą.

[h1]Podsumowanie:[/h1]

Homeworld Remastered Collection to rewelacyjny zestaw dwóch odświeżonych klasycznych tytułów z gatunku gier strategicznych w której to widowiskowa akcja rozgrywać się będzie w dalekiej przestrzeni kosmicznej.

Polecam!


[quote]Zachęcam wszystkich do obserwacji [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/32785706/ ]kuratora[/url], by na bieżąco otrzymywać świeże informacje o nowo zrecenzowanych tytułach.[/quote]

184765648.review:
各种都很不错，唯一的缺点就是我不喜欢这个故事的原型。
家园1和家园2的故事原型是什么我相信对中东问题感兴趣的都知道。
如果说自恋、自诩为天选之人尚可理解的话，美化鸠占鹊巢抢别人家房子这事就不能接受了，所以我只能给8分。
即使是推荐给别人，我也会连带着这故事的内涵和我对反殖民的看法一起推荐的。
很难评价家园1和家园2的故事相比于家园3是否更好，前者是不要脸，后者是低智商。

183597102.review:
Instead of playing the "new" homeworld 3 by the self insert narcissists at gearbox, play this collection instead.
Well, buying it might encourage gearbox to further screw it up.
But compared to homeworld 3, this much much older collection will make you feel more like you are in a grand space strategy game, (instead of power fantasy of a middle aged women in middle management).
You will also get to experience many game mechanics the developers had the funds and time to implement instead of modeling and animating dumb cut scenes that only stroke the ego of the self inserts.

Also you will quickly notice that Homeworld series (besides #3) are about the story and the epic, and not about the individuals and their petty feelings, or how much they cry and need to show emotion.
